title: Trump stonewalls democracy: Dan Balz & Katie Glueck, plus Democratic polling expert David Shor
description: Chief Correspondent for the Washington Post, Dan Balz, and Katie Glueck, national politics reporter for the New York Times, join Chuck to talk about the Biden transition effort and Republican resistance. Democratic polling expert David Shor talks through lessons learned from the 2020 vote.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: Chief Correspondent for the Washington Post, Dan Balz, and Katie Glueck, national politics reporter for the New York Times, join Chuck to talk about the Biden transition effort and Republican resistance.
